attributes.action: Make 16th May an official spring garden party bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: Because I have a feeling I could convince more than half the general population to motion this argument
attributes.background: Make 16th May an official spring garden party bank holiday

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by a "spring garden party bank holiday". 

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&q=bank+holiday
